title: 114_hr6314
content: Commission on the Removal of Mexican-Americans to Mexico This bill establishes the Commission on the Removal of Mexican-Americans to Mexico, which shall: (1) review the facts and circumstances surrounding the 1929-1941 removal of certain US citizens and permanent legal residents to Mexico and the impact of such actions on such individuals, their families, and the Mexican-American community. (2) review federal, state, and local government directives that required such removal and any other related information. And (3) report its findings, conclusions, and any recommendations for legislative actions.
